CLUE: Dispenser of vapour for the nose or lungs

FOUND IN: Denarius – By removing the letter ‘d’ and adding an ‘i,’ we get “nariuns,” resembling 'naris' (Latin for nostril) indicating something that could be unread because it is not spoken but seen.
Omagh (in the neighboring county of Tyrone)
Tenerife (second largest but not part of this category as it is larger than Fuerteventura)
